page.title: 08OUTDOOR RECREATION.
page.content: There are a large number of outdoor recreational facilities in the area. West Kirby has two parks,Ashton Park and Coronation Gardens.Ashton Park has bowling greens,tennis courts,childrens playground and a lake.There is also a Pitch and putt course by the promenade. Newton has its own park with a childrens playground and football pitches and a bowling green. There are private golf facilities at Caldy Golf Club and there are also some large ponds in which local angling clubs are able to fish. The beach and the sea are also very popular with residents and visitors and the Marine Lake provides excellent safe, sheltered sailing for children and adults of all ages and abilities.
